neu:sampleInfo.neu:title: Biometrics tutorials
neu:sampleInfo.neu:description: Common tutorials demonstrate basic functionality related to template management, identification and verification of templates.[br] The following tutorials are provided:[br] [b]ShowTemplateContent[/b] - shows all information of modalities and their propeties contained in specified template.[br] [b]Identify[/b] - permorms template 1:N identification (for all available modalities).[br] [b]Verify[/b] - permorms template 1:1 verification (for all available modalities).[br] Faces tutorials demonstrate basic functionality related with faces enrollment, identification and verification.[br] The following tutorials are provided:[br] [b]Detect facial features[/b] - detect face position in image.[br] [b]Enroll from image/stream[/b] - create face template from image or stream of images.[br] [b]Enroll from camera[/b] - create face feature template from camera.[br] [b]Identify[/b] - perform 1:N identification.[br] [b]Verify[/b] - perform 1:1 identification.[br] [b]Multiple face matching[/b] - find all faces in image and perform identification.[br] [b]Create multi face template[/b] - pack multiple faces into a single template.[br] [br] Fingerprint tutorials demonstrate basic functionality related with fingerprint enrollment identification, and verification.[br] The following tutorials are provided:[br] [b]Enroll from image[/b] - load fingerprint from image and create template from it.[br] [b]Enroll from scanner[/b] - scan fingerprint and create template from it.[br] [b]Generalize[/b] - generalize multiple fingerprint templates into one.[br] [b]Segment[/b] - segments slaps into one/several fingeprints.[br] [b]Identify[/b] - perform 1:N identification.[br] [b]Verify[/b] - perform 1:1 identification.[br] [b]CreateMultiFingerTemplate[/b] - pack multiple fingerprints into a single template.[br] [br] Irises tutorials demonstrate basic functionality related with iris enrollment, identification and verification.[br] The following tutorials are provided:[br] [b]Enroll from image[/b] - create iris template from image.[br] [b]Enroll from scanner[/b] - create iris template from iris scanner.[br] [b]Identify[/b] - perform 1:N identification.[br] [b]Verify[/b] - perform 1:1 identification.[br] [b]Segment[/b] - segments iris.[br] [b]Two eye NTemplate[/b] - pack two eyes into a single template.[br] [br] Palms tutorials demonstrate basic functionality related with palm enrollment, identification and verification.[br] The following tutorials are provided:[br] [b]Enroll from image[/b] - create palmprint template from image.[br] [b]Identify[/b] - perform 1:N identification.[br] [b]Verify[/b] - perform 1:1 identification.[br] [b]Generalize[/b] - generalize multiple palmprint templates into a single template.[br] Voices tutorials demonstrate basic functionality related with voice enrollment, identification and verification.[br] The following tutorials are provided:[br] [b]Enroll from audio file[/b] - create voice template from audio file.[br] [b]Enroll from microphone[/b] - create voice template from microphone.[br]
